si.title: අවසාන මැතිවරණය මාතලේ දිස්ත්රික්කයේ ප්රති Results ල

en.title: The final election results in the Matale district

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the final election results in the Matale district in approximately 200 characters:
"Key points: [Candidate A] won with 52% of votes, followed by [Candidate B] with 45%. Turnout was 75%, highest in years. Local issues dominated campaign."
